name: (C)ur-viving
description:
This game was created in 2 days of non-consecutive work.

Movement: A/D or    <-/->

Jump: W or Space or arrowUp

Attack with Left Click and switch weapons with E

Your goal is to survive as long as possible, with increasing difficulty caused by a randomly selected curse(negative effect) after every round of enemy waves.

This game was meant to participate in the Kenney Game Jam...!

https://itch.io/jam/kenney-jam-2020

The theme was "Cursed", but i was seconds too late to submit.

Because of wrong time expectations there are no sounds, animations or menus  

haha :D
